select
ware.ware_id , ware.ware_code , ware.ware_name, ware.add_time, ware.memo, ware.company_id
from ware_info ware left join company com on ware.company_id = com.company_id where 1=1
AND (ware.ware_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWords}, '%') or com.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWords}, '%') or ware.memo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWords}, '%') )
AND ware.company_id = #{companyId}
